name: bob_bot
description: A (very) simple chatbot coded for the Everchron coding challenge.

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf public/assets && mkdir public/assets && mkdir public/assets/javascripts
scripts.build: cp -R app/assets/stylesheets public/assets/stylesheets && browserify app/assets/javascripts/application.js | uglifyjs > public/assets/javascripts/application.js
